li.label: melee sim (fluent drills)

li.label: melee sim (perfect counter)
li.description: A strike I’d never seen arrived; my body answered before thought.

li.label: construction sim (simple framing)
li.description: Walls rose and dissolved; laying down structure felt strangely easy.

li.label: construction sim (clean blueprint)
li.description: The sim unfolded a building piece by piece, showing where parts belonged.

li.label: construction sim (moving architecture)
li.description: The design shifted as I worked, settling like a memory.

li.label: mining sim (gentle tunneling)
li.description: Each strike echoed softly, as if the stone was patient.

li.label: mining sim (reading the veins)
li.description: The sim highlighted seams, guiding me to the best cuts.

li.label: mining sim (living stone)
li.description: The rock seemed to breathe between blows, opening where it mattered.

li.label: cooking sim (easy recipes)
li.description: Ingredients never spoiled and heat stayed gentle; cooking felt scripted and kind.

li.label: cooking sim (flowing prepwork)
li.description: Chopping, seasoning, and stirring lined up in one smooth motion.

li.label: cooking sim (perfect dish)
li.description: The sim plated a meal I could almost taste; for a second it felt flawless.

li.label: plant sim (gentle sowing)
li.description: Soil parted easily and rows lined themselves in calm, straight lines.

li.label: plant sim (reading growth)

li.label: plant sim (breathing field)
li.description: Crops swayed in perfect unison, like the field exhaled.

li.description: Creatures approached without fear, following simple gestures.

li.label: animal-handling sim (shared trust)
li.description: I watched a wary animal relax, one slow step at a time.

li.label: animal-handling sim (unspoken understanding)
li.description: For a few breaths, it felt like the animal and I shared the same thought.

li.label: crafting sim (simple assembly)
li.description: Pieces slotted together without a fight; the bench felt almost grateful.

li.label: crafting sim (flawless routine)
li.description: Every tool laid itself out in the right order; my hands just followed.

li.label: crafting sim (invisible tolerances)

li.label: art sim (easy sketches)
li.description: Lines appeared where I meant them to, for once.

li.label: art sim (flowing expression)
li.description: The sim gave me space to try shapes and colours I’d never risk.

li.label: art sim (image that lingers)
li.description: The piece I made keeps resurfacing when I close my eyes.

li.label: medical sim (basic treatment drills)

li.label: medical sim (steady surgery practice)
li.description: Each step walked through slowly and patiently; nothing rushed.

li.label: social sim (being understood)

li.description: Pages turned themselves, and the words stayed where I left them.
